import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HomeScreen from "./screens/HomeScreen" import ProductScreen from "./screens/ProductScreen" import CartScreen from "./screens/CartScreen" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import SigninScreen from "./screens/SigninScreen" function App() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {cartItems} = cart return (
Shopio
Cart {cartItems.length > 0 &&( {cartItems.length} )} Sign In
All right reserved
 ); } export default App;
